title: Production capacity at Johan Sverdrup oil field increasing to 500k barrels a day
lead: The increase is around 60,000 barrels more than the original basis when the field came on stream over a year ago

title: SSEN deploys drones to inspect electricity infrastructure
lead: Its partnership with Cyberhawk sees the use of drones to visualise power infrastructure from the rural Cotswolds to the urban areas of West London, without intrusion or inconvenience to customers

title: Panasonic, Equinor and Hydro to check out lithium-ion battery business potential
lead: The collaboration aims to target the European market for electric vehicles and other applications

title: NASA: Global nitrogen dioxide emissions plummeted by 20% during Covid-19 lockdowns
lead: In almost 50 out of 61 city centres, nitrogen dioxide reductions were between 20% and 60% since the pandemic began, according to a new report

title: British Embassy in Havana invites bids for climate change projects
lead: It will provide funding between £500 and £10,000 for projects that support climate action, create resilience and reduce national emissions

title: New £20m UK investment to tackle plastic waste in developing nations
lead: UK Research and Innovation is supporting partnerships with researchers across 11 countries: China, Chile, Egypt, Ecuador, India, Indonesia, Peru, Malawi, Sri Lanka, Tanzania and Vietnam

title: Scientists develop recyclable wind turbine blade material that ‘could transform wind industry’
lead: The use of thermoplastic resin promises to make wind turbine blades lighter, lower-cost and more recyclable

title: London to host ‘UK’s largest’ e-scooter trial
lead: Tfl has launched a competition to select up to three operators to take part in a 12-month trial of rental e-scooters

title: NI Water awarded £5m for hydrogen project at wastewater treatment site
lead: The development of a 1MW electrolyser aims to explore how hydrogen could increase wastewater treatment system’s capacity and decarbonise it

title: The green revolution’s under way let’s meet again!
lead: Join us on June 9th for a net zero festival and on June 23rd for a consultants’ conference and awards ceremony
